Synopsis: Create a new label on a given GitHub repository.
Description:
Create a new label on a given GitHub repository.

The Git repo for this module can be found here: http://aka.ms/PowerShellForGitHub
Inputs:
GitHub.Branch
GitHub.Content
GitHub.Event
GitHub.Issue
GitHub.IssueComment
GitHub.Label
GitHub.Milestone
GitHub.PullRequest
GitHub.Project
GitHub.ProjectCard
GitHub.ProjectColumn
GitHub.Reaction
GitHub.Release
GitHub.ReleaseAsset
GitHub.Repository

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
New-GitHubLabel -OwnerName microsoft -RepositoryName PowerShellForGitHub -Label TestLabel -Color BBBBBB
Creates a new, grey-colored label called "TestLabel" in the PowerShellForGitHub project.
